name: Sonrise
description:
Sonrise is a short juicy platformer in which you help out a little robot trying to find its son.  Parts of it can be quite hard to complete, but I believe and so does the little robot!

For my German pals:

Ich hab das Unity Lokalisierungs System etwas missbraucht und deshalb werden auf der normalen Version keine/falsche Übersetzungen angezeigt. Falls Ihr die normale Version spielt solltet Ihr vorher die Steuerung hier unten durchlesen, ansonsten koennt Ihr auch die Version mit Übersetzung spielen, die ich nachträglich hinzugefuegt hab und duerft auch ruhig etwas schlechter bewerten: Sonrise mit Deutscher Übersetzung (Google Drive)

Controls

SPACE to JUMP [When enabled, see UI at bottom of screen]

A and D to TURN [When enabled, see UI at bottom of screen]]

LMB to place Objects

I put great focus on atmosphere and making the game chill. Some parts can be a bit tricky, but here's some tips: aim in front of the robot!

Respawn Times are instant though, no need to worry about Loading Screens!

The amount of control over the AI changes every other level, which is indicated in the UI and makes each level play a bit different than the previous one.

Made in Unity.

Any critique is welcome, this is only my 2nd game and first Game Jam entry, I want to know what I could've done better and did well!

Enjoy! 

For anyone getting stuck on Level 3, since this seems to be a thing, and wants some help, I've made a video of myself playing it as reference for you!
